verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Tushukie, Masiya,
kutuokoa dhambini,
mkombozi ee Masiya
njoo, njoo, njoo.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Tumekosa, tumeacha
kumpenda Mungu mwenyezi
kwa dhambi zetu nyingi.
Twakulilia wewe,
uje kutupatanisha.
Twakutamani sana,
njoo, njoo, njoo.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sisi watu ni vipofu
hatuoni njia zake
Mungu duniani kwetu.
Twakulilia wewe,
uje, uwe mwanga wetu.
Twakutamani sana,
njoo, njoo, njoo.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Udhaifu wetu mkuu,
tunashindwa kutimiza
amri zote za Mungu.
Twakulilia wewe,
uje kutuimarisha.
Twakutamani sana,
njoo, njoo, njoo.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ufahamu wetu mdogo
hatujui kupendana
hatumwelewi Baba.
Twakulilia wewe,
utufundishe hekima.
Twakutamani sana,
njoo, njoo, njoo.
